response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, the product is valued at $1,000,000 by many, yet we are excited to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent opportunity to acquire a game-changing asset at a competitive rate. We look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us.", "product_price": 950000}
